sections.title: Advanced Engineering Simulation and Modeling → Simulación y modelado avanzado de ingeniería

listening.audio: How does multiphysics simulation benefit engineering design?

It only simulates one physical effect
It eliminates the need for physical testing

options: It's faster, cheaper, and allows testing of more design variations

listening.audio: Why is uncertainty quantification important in engineering simulation?
options: It helps engineers understand the reliability and confidence of simulation predictions
